purpose: To provide a framework for developing AI agents entirely within the Kotlin ecosystem
principle: Leverages Kotlin's language features and libraries to create a seamless development experience for AI agent creation
reusability: Designed to be modular and extensible, allowing developers to build custom agents with ease
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability
name: koog
description: Koog is a Kotlin-based framework designed to build and run AI agents entirely in idiomatic Kotlin.
highlight: Kotlin-based framework for building AI agents using idiomatic Kotlin
